|  [findParentWs(workspace)](./blockly.mutator.findparentws.md) | <code>static</code> | Get the parent workspace of a workspace that is inside a mutator, taking into account whether it is a flyout. |

|  [shouldIgnoreMutatorEvent\_(e)](./blockly.mutator.shouldignoremutatorevent_.md) |  | Returns whether the given event in the mutator workspace should be ignored when deciding whether to update the workspace and compose the block or not. |
